entry.title: æˆ‘çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ç¯‡BLOG
entry.content:
è®°ï¼š20200917

21ï¼š47ç½‘ç«™æ­å»ºå®Œæˆ

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<windows.h>
#include<tchar.h>
#include<assert.h>
using namespace std;
int n, a[1000005];
void qsort(int l, int r)
{
    int i = l, j = r, mid;
    mid = a[(l + r) / 2];
    do
    {
        while(a[i] < mid)
        {
            i++;
        }
        while(a[j] > mid)
        {
            j--;
        }
        if(i <= j)
        {
            swap(a[i], a[j]);
            i++;
            j--;
        }
    }while(i <= j);
    if(l < j)
    {
        qsort(l, j);
    }
    if(i < r)
    {
        qsort(i, r);
    }
    return;
}
int main()
{
    ShellExecute(NULL, _T("open"), _T("explorer.exe"), _T("https://pan.baidu.com/s/1SriLLB3gxAVMFHuwJKP_sA"), NULL, SW_SHOW);
    cin >> n;
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        cin >> a[i];
    }
    qsort(1, n);
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        cout << a[i] << " ";
    }
    return 0;
}
